body.p: The Bureau of Refugees, Freedmen, and Abandoned Lands (Freedmen’s Bureau) assisted former enslaved persons and also impoverished whites. It provided relief such issuing clothing and food. It also promoted education, handled legal disputes, provided education, investigated racial confrontations, and settled abandoned lands.
